verses.t: Whosoever{G3956} believeth{G4100} that{G3754} Jesus{G2424} is{G2076} the Christ{G3588} is born{G1080} of{G1537} God{G3588}: and{G2532} every one{G3956} that{G3588} loveth{G25} him{G3588} that begat{G1080} loveth{G25} him{G3588} also{G2532} that is begotten{G1080} of{G1537} him{G846}."Agapa" could either be indicative or subjunctive. I placed the indicative tag around "loveth" and the subjunctive tag following "loveth."

And{G2532} this{G3778} is{G2076} the record{G3588}, that{G3754} God{G3588} hath given{G1325} to us{G2254} eternal{G166} life{G2222}, and{G2532} this{G3778} life{G3588} is{G2076} in{G1722} his{G846} Son{G3588}.
